title: Divine Emerald & Diamond Floral Kanti Haaram
features: This exquisite Kanti Haaram showcases a delicate floral design, meticulously crafted with shimmering diamonds and a central, captivating Emerald. The design incorporates traditional Telugu filigree motifs, enhanced with Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster. Dangling gold beads add a touch of playful elegance.
colors: with vibrant Emerald green and sparkling white Diamonds.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Its timeless design also makes it a cherished heirloom piece.
description: This haaram is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and timeless elegance. The combination of brilliant diamonds and a lush green emerald creates a captivating visual impact. The traditional design elements and Hyderabadi polish ensure that this piece is both a cultural treasure and a valuable investment.
